get.summary: Returns whether the logged-in user is eligible for application of the requested type

parameters.name: applicationType
parameters.description: The type of application (e.g. old age pension) to check for eligibility

get.summary: Returns the currently logged-in user's personal and bank info

post.summary:
This endpoint is only used temporarily to imitate one time payment uploads. This and the endpoint associated
with uploading documents for withdrawal and one time payment will be combined to a single, generic endpoint

This endpoint is only used temporarily to imitate withdrawal uploads. This and the endpoint associated
with uploading documents for withdrawal and one time payment will be combined to a single, generic endpoint
Creates applications of various types, depending on the input.applicationType parameter

requestBody.description: Input for application, varies by type

post.summary: Adds a list of documents to an application in Island.is

parameters.name: applicationGuid
parameters.description: The application GUID for the application in Island.is

requestBody.description: A list of incoming documents that needs to be attached to the application

get.summary: Returns a list of valid currencies (for registering a foreign bank account)
Endpoint to get paymentplan for a given nationalId
Endpoint to get the next/previous payments for a given nationalId

post.summary: Returns general pension calculations for input data

get.summary: Dummy service for testing X-Road connectivity

This is an unauthorized ping endpoint. It is only used for organization to organization
testing of communications.

help.description: URL to a page explaining the error and possible solutions

trackingId.description: Identifier for mapping failures to service internal codes

param.description: Name of the parameter which was incorrect

emailAddress.description: The email address of the applicant

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the applicant

isEligible.description: A boolean to determine whether the applicant is eligible to apply for this type of application

reason.description: If the applicant is not eligible, a reason why he is not eligible is included

file.description: The actual file (base64 encoded) of the document

language.description: Value for the language, currently we support IS and EN

portalApplicationID.description: ID of the application in portal

Dagssetning.description: Date when application was last changed

Adilar.description: List of persons that have a role in the application

Notandagogn.description: Information extracted from the application that the ruleset can use.

files.description: Files that are in the application if any.

dags.description: Date when the file was uploaded into the application

FileID.description: The file id that can be used to fetch the file in LVG

ending.description: extension if the file if available else empty

countryCode.description:
if tegund is "landalisti" then the countryCode is included.
This is a two letter countryCode, i.e. "DK" for Denmark

nafn.description: If tegund is "kennitala" then the name of the payer is included

message.description: Message to be displayed to the user if the application is not valid.

typeOfBasePension.description:
Ellilífeyrir 1
Ellilífeyrir sjómanna 2
Örorkulífeyrir 3
Endurhæfingarlífeyrir 4
Hálfur ellilífeyrir 5

livingCondition.description:
Heimilisaðstæður, býr ein(n) ?
Býr ein(n) = 1
Býr ekki ein(n) = 2

start.description:
Byrjar á ellilífeyri frá TR:
 2017 eða fyrr = 1 
 2018 eða seinna = 2

startPension.description:
Byrjar á ellilífeyri frá TR:
 2017 eða fyrr = 1
 2018 eða seinna = 2
 Sjálfvalið gildi er 2018 eða seinna

childSupportCount.description: Fær meðlag greitt með hvað mörgum börnum

livingConditionAbroadInYears.description: Hefur búið í hve mörg ár erlendis

typeOfPeriodIncome.description:
Mánaðar- eða árstekjur
Sjálfgefið er mánaðrtekjur
Mánaðartekjur = 2

Bearer.description: Using the Authorization header with the Bearer scheme.
